sense.gloss: skirmish, brush (with the enemy), small fight with a military enemy
squabble, quarrel, brief argument, exchange of words

sdata.j: ↑国境↑↓こっきょう↓↑問題↑↓もんだい↓での↑小競↑↓|こぜ↓り↑合↑↓あ↓い|から↑重大↑↓じゅうだい↓な↑国際↑↓こくさい↓↑紛争↑↓ふんそう↓へと↑広↑↓ひろ↓がりました。
sdata.e: A small border dispute ballooned into a major international incident.
